content: №5 …. those two are some pair….. of…… №20 …. Even Lucifer has some morals… he wouldn’t touch this Travesty with a pitchfork !!! Protection spell for Prasanna/Lakshmi and all of us ! “By the dragons light,  on this (month) night,  I call to thee to give me your might,  by the power of three,  I conjure thee,  to protect all that,  Surrounds me,  So mote it be,  So mote it be!!!”
